column1: 112,GEN-1,1,The following code loads and parses an XML file.,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL
112,GEN-1,3,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,The XML file is loaded without validating it against a known XML Schema or DTD.
112,GEN-2,1,The following code creates a DocumentBuilder object to be used in building an XML document.,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL
112,GEN-2,3,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,"The DocumentBuilder object does not validate an XML document against a schema, making it possible to create an invalid XML document."
